meanings.definition: A small school, typically offering specialized or alternative education programs.
meanings.sent1: The minischool had only a few classrooms.
meanings.sent2: She decided to enroll her child in the minischool down the street.
meanings.sent3: The minischool for wizards taught spells alongside math.
meanings.sent4: In the world of education, the minischool was a hidden gem.
meanings.sent5: The colorful murals on the walls made the minischool feel welcoming.

meanings.definition: To attend or be enrolled in a minischool.
meanings.sent1: He will minischool at the new campus next semester.
meanings.sent2: They minischool together to learn coding skills.
meanings.sent3: She minischools on weekends to improve her art.
meanings.sent4: In her dreams, she minischools in a magical castle.
meanings.sent5: Minischooling allows for more personalized learning experiences.
